backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister implementing orders, user profiles, admin login tracking, access control, banning, and blob storage mixins.
backend/old.mo: Older module defining simplified order, signature, and user profile types plus an actor state structure.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like mapping of frontend file paths to short feature and behavior summaries.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Detailed deployment guide describing backend IC requirements and frontend cPanel hosting steps.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining color tokens, dark mode, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript entry file.
frontend/public/.htaccess: Optional Apache config enabling compression, caching, MIME types, and security headers for static hosting.
frontend/public/DEPLOYMENT.md: Frontend-only deployment guide for hosting the React build on cPanel at FalconIds.com.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling hash-based routing, authentication hooks, admin access checks, and showing admin invitation modals.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAcces: Gatekeeper component ensuring identity and admin panel session before rendering admin content.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminInvit: Modal for accepting or declining admin invitations, handling mutation states and errors.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminOrder: Admin form for editing order and shipping details with validation and save handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/PaymentCon: Component allowing admins to update a payment contact status and notes, with UI controls and submit handling.
frontend/src/components/BannedUserGate.t: Wrapper that blocks access for banned users, showing a suspension message if the current principal is banned.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button managing Internet Identity auth, admin session clearing, and query invalidation.
frontend/src/components/LoginRequiredScr: Displays a login-required message with reasons and a login button for unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/components/PrincipalIdFoote: Empty placeholder component with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/SignaturePad.tsx: Canvas-based signature input component allowing drawing, clearing, and emitting the signature as a data URL.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates related queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Deprecated hook that checks whether the current user is an admin by calling the backend and managing loading and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminBootstrap.ts: Automatically assigns the admin role to a designated principal once per session and invalidates admin-related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminInvitation.ts: Hooks for checking, accepting, or declining admin invitations with query invalidation and retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminLogin.ts: Handles admin panel login via backend credentials and activates local admin panel session state.
Manages persistent admin panel session state per principal, including load, set, and clear operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminRestore.ts: Mutation hook that restores admin privileges for the current caller and refreshes related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnsureUserRole.ts: Ensures authenticated users have the user role by invalidating and refreshing role-related caches once per principal.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, identity state, and auth client creation.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: React Query hooks for creating, fetching, and updating orders using the backend actor, with cache invalidation on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Hooks to fetch and save the authenticated user's profile, including cache invalidation for profile and admin status.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfileGate.ts: Determines whether an authenticated user must complete profile setup by checking profile state and auth status.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserBans.ts: Provides hooks to query banned users, check if a principal is banned, and ban or unban users with cache updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theming variables, dark mode styles, typography, transitions, and layout rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that initializes React, sets up QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and global styles.
Handles admin login flow with authentication checks, session handling, and credential validation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrderDetai: Admin page for viewing and editing a single order, handling status changes, payment updates, and customer detail edits.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Admin list view for all orders with search, filtering, statistics, and delete confirmation handling.
Admin interface for listing users from orders, managing bans, and unbanning users with validation and confirmations.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page component displaying a hero section, navigation buttons, and informational cards about the service.
frontend/src/pages/MyOrdersPage.tsx: Page for authenticated users to view and inspect their orders, with loading states, authentication gating, and order details.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Displays an order confirmation screen and auto-opens a modal with payment contact details and accepted methods.
frontend/src/pages/OrderPage.tsx: Implements a full order form with validation, ID info fields, photo and signature upload, and order submission logic.
frontend/src/pages/PricesPage.tsx: Shows pricing details for IDs, feature breakdowns, and links users to the order page.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Allows authenticated users to view and edit their profile information, copy their principal ID, and restore admin access if authorized.
frontend/src/utils/adminPanelSession.ts: LocalStorage helpers for storing and clearing admin-session markers by principal ID.
frontend/src/utils/assetPaths.ts: Utilities for generating base-path-safe URLs for static assets and documents.
frontend/src/utils/errorFormatting.ts: Formats and redacts error messages and extracts backend-specific error details.
frontend/src/utils/fileValidation.ts: Client-side validators for image file type and size plus utilities to convert files to byte arrays.
frontend/src/utils/idGenerators.ts: Random generators for fake names and addresses using local predefined lists.
frontend/src/utils/orderFormatting.ts: Formatting helpers for order dates and readable status labels.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear parameters from the hash for routing and state retention.
frontend/src/utils/usStates.ts: Exports a constant list of US states with value/label pairs for UI dropdowns.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and enabled plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes the projectâ€™s state and requirements focused on removing admin-only restrictions and persisting admin login sessions.
